title: Get In
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 64 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 80L
description: Everyone is eager to get into the pool, but will everyone fit? Written in a question and answer format, Get In reveals who can and cannot fit in the wading pool.
reviewWords: boy, cannot, dog, duck, elephant, girl, in, man, pig, woman
awareness: Blend Onset and Rime                : Blend onset and rime sounds
grammar: Question Marks                : Identify and understand the use of question marks
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize high-frequency words he, it, in, can, get, she
